spec_data.Name: hddfancontrol
spec_data.Description:
HDD Fan control is a command line tool to dynamically control fan speed
according to hard drive temperature on Linux.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 03:43:09 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Control system fan speed by monitoring hard drive temperature
